word:
(131)                           Elmshaven, Sanitarium, Calif. 
                                    Feb. 20, '05. B.-75-05 Dear Brethren Palmer and Ballenger:-- 
     We are well pleased with the reports that Brother Ballenger has sent us of the work of the Paradise Valley Sanitarium. What 


                         -83- 

we see being accomplished there is a fulfillment of what I have been instructed we might expect. For this we thank the Lord, and take courage for the future, believing that the Lord will bless and guide.
